## Source: ossf-package-analysis (69e0eb3aa7db12607d4a6b52da50f110d5b6da1dc70c4e9ed177fa0f136b0f27)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'vite-plugin-esm-federation' @ 99.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
